casebody.data:
KENNEDY, et al.
v.
SPEEDWAY. No. 469P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. G. Gray Wilson, Kevin B. Cartledge, Winston-Salem, Katherine C. Wagner, for Kennedy, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of September 2006 by Defendants to Dismiss Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
